name: THE OATS VIDEO GAME
description:
BROTHER, I REQUIRE OATS.

:D

Controls: Use WASD to move. Mouse to look. TAP the shift key to run (don't hold it). Hold the left-mouse button to fish for oats. Let go of the left-mouse button to reel in the oat fish if you catch one. Use ENTER and SPACE to interact with the menus and with objects in the video game. Feed the pigs or else they get mad and they attack you or something IDK lol.
